page.title: 13A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content:
A DAY IN MY LIFE.(11Yr old girl) My name is Kate and I am eleven years old.I have three ponies called Jenny,Gamecock and Smokey. When I woke up on Sunday the 30th of June I dressed in my riding clothes.When I went downstairs mum was cooking breakfast.For breakfast I had bacon,sausage and egg.When I had eaten my breakfast I went down the yard and groomed my pony.I put leg bandages and a tail bandage on her.I went back to the house and had a wash.We then set off to Spilsby Show at about 9 o'clock. A show is an event where you have show-jumping and showing.Showing is where a judge decides whose pony is the best.
{(cont.on p.14.)
